Renault Group's funding and investors

How much funding has Renault Group raised till date?

Renault Group has not raised any funding rounds yet.

Who are Renault Group's investors?

There are no Institutional or Angel investors in Renault Group.

Renault Group's founders and board of directors

Founder? Claim Profile

Who are the founders of Renault Group?

The founders of Renault Group are Fernand Renault, Louis Renault and Marcel Renault.

Who is the current CEO of Renault Group?

Luca De Meo is the CEO of Renault Group .

Renault Group's Competitors and alternates

Competitive landscape of Renault Group

Renault Group ranks 144 th among 1358 competitors which include Tesla, Waymo and Volvo Cars. 119 of its competitors are funded while 176 have exited. Overall, Renault Group and its competitors have raised over $68.7B in funding across 453 funding rounds involving 1121 investors. There are 10 private unicorns, 95 public and 81 acquired companies in the entire competition set.

Frequently asked questions about Renault Group

When was Renault Group founded?

Renault Group was founded in 1898

Where is Renault Group located?

Renault Group is located in Boulogne billancourt, France.

Is Renault Group a public company?

Renault Group is a public company, it went public on Nov 18, 1994.
